name: Rho Capital Partners
overview: Rho has been an active venture capital investor since their inception in 1981. They diversify their investments across various high growth sectors, including information technology, communications, new media, healthcare and energy technology, and invest throughout all stages of a company’s development from seed to growth equity rounds.
